texts: {"template":"bulletlist","items":["Add up to 5 vehicles to Auto Pay","£10 annual registration charge for each vehicle added"]}
You can only add 5 vehicles to Auto Pay. If you are a business customer and have more than 5 vehicles, you may want to set up a Fleet Auto Pay service .

Based on the vehicle registration (VRM) details that you have entered and the classification information held by Transport for London (TfL) on this day, your vehicle is deemed 100% discounted and you are not required to pay the congestion charge.
If you believe that this information is incorrect and you still want to pay the Congestion Charge, then you can continue.
Please be aware that classification may change without notification, so you should always check to see if payment is required for journeys into the zone.

Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, this vehicle is exempt from the Congestion Charge. If you believe this is incorrect and you still want to pay the Congestion Charge, add this vehicle or apply for a discount, then you can continue with this process.
This may change without notice - always check to see if you need to pay within the zone.
If the number plate (Vehicle Registration Mark) is correct but the vehicle description shown is wrong, you can still continue to pay for this vehicle.
Vehicle information is provided to TfL by the DVLA, so you'll need to let the DVLA know if your vehicle details are wrong or need to be updated.
UK-registered: If your vehicle’s make and model details have not been returned, please make sure you entered the Vehicle Registration Mark correctly before continuing.
Registered outside the United Kingdom: We are unable to display the make, model and colour information. Confirm your details before continuing.
You have already selected this vehicle
This vehicle can't be added to your Auto Pay service. Click on 'Edit' if you want to select another vehicle.
This vehicle can't be added to your Auto Pay. It has already been registered for Auto Pay by someone else on another account.
To add this vehicle you need to prove that you have authority to do so. Call us on 0343 222 2222 ( TfL call charges ) for more information.
If this is not the vehicle you meant to add, click on 'Edit' to select another vehicle.
